title: Refactor authentication middleware
description: The current authentication middleware is tightly coupled and difficult to test. Refactor to use dependency injection and make it more modular.

title: Implement lazy loading for dashboard widgets
description: Dashboard loads all widgets at once causing slow initial load. Implement lazy loading to improve performance and user experience.

title: Add Redis caching layer
description: Implement Redis caching for frequently accessed data to reduce database load and improve response times.

title: Implement WebSocket connection pooling
description: Current WebSocket implementation doesn't handle connection pooling efficiently. Add connection pooling and reconnection logic.

title: Add comprehensive error logging
description: Implement structured logging with error tracking, performance metrics, and user activity monitoring using Winston and Sentry.

title: Optimize bundle size with code splitting
description: Application bundle is too large. Implement route-based code splitting and lazy loading to reduce initial bundle size.

title: Add internationalization (i18n) support
description: Implement multi-language support for the application with React-i18next. Start with English, Spanish, and French.

title: Implement automated database migrations
description: Set up automated database migration system with rollback capabilities for safe production deployments.
